Description:
Greet vendors, customers, job applicants and other visitors and arrange for transportation services when needed.
Direct visitors by maintaining employee and department directories.
Operate a switchboard to route incoming calls and place outgoing calls.

Provide basic and accurate information in-person and via phone/email
Stay prompt in conducting all the essential tasks and responsibilities expected from a corporate receptionist.Skills

An optimistic individual able to interact with the desired person through written and spoken communication modes.
Hands-on experience in operating MS Office Suite and relevant software.
Sound command on effective management of existing tasks to enhance work output and create a smooth flow of in-house operations.
